text:
Vin Diesel (born Mark Sinclair Vincent; July 18, 1967) is an American actor, writer, director, producer and voice talent. His acting includes movies, television and video games. Diesel is known for his roles in the movies "The Fast and the Furious" series, "The Chronicles of Riddick" trilogy, the voice of Groot in the "Marvel Cinematic Universe" and in "XXX".
Diesel was born in New York City, New York. He studied at Hunter College. He is partners with Paloma Jimenez. His father is African-American and His mother is of English, German, Irish and Scottish descent.
